[03] sabbavacanānamattho akkhareheva saññāyate. akkharavipattiyaṃ hi atthassa dunnayathā hoti, tasmā akkharakosallaṃ bahūpakāraṃ suttantesu.
[03] te ca kho akkharā api ^b^a^eb^kārādayo ekacattā līsa suttantesu sopakārā.
[03] taṃ yathā? a ā i ī u ū e o, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ, iti ^b^akkharā^eb^ nāma.
[03] tattha akkharesu ^b^a^eb^kārādīsu ^b^o^eb^dantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? a ā i ī u ū e o, iti ^b^sarā^eb^ nāma.
[03] tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? a i u, iti ^b^rassā^eb^ nāma.
[03] tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? ā ī ū e o, iti ^b^dīghā^eb^ nāma.
[03] ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā akkharā ^b^ka^eb^kārādayo ^b^niggahita^eb^ntā byañjanā nāma honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṃ, iti ^b^byañjanā^eb^ nāma.
[03] tesaṃ kho byañjanānaṃ ^b^ka^eb^kārādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā nāma honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, iti ^b^vaggā^eb^ nāma.
[03] yā ca pana paresu sakkataganthesu samaññā ghosāti vā aghosāti vā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.

[03] ^b^tattha^eb^ ghosā nāma-ga gha ṅa, ja jha ña, ḍa ḍha ṇa, da dha na, ba bha ma, ya ra la va ha ḷa, iti ^b^ghosā^eb^ nāma. aghosā nāma-ka kha, ca cha, ṭa ṭha, ta tha, pa pha, sa, iti ^b^aghosā^eb^ nāma.
[03] tattha sandhiṃ kattukāmo pubbabyañjanaṃ adhoṭhitaṃ assaraṃ katvā sarañca upari katvā sarena viyojaye.
[03] assaraṃ kho byañjanaṃ adhoṭhataṃ parakkharaṃ naye yutte. tatrābhiratimiccheyya.
[03] ^b^yutte^eb^tikasmā? akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me. ettha pana yuttaṃ na hoti.
[03] sarā kho sare pare lopaṃ papponti.
[03] yassindriyāni samathaṅgatāni. no hetaṃ bhante sametāyasmā saṅghena.
[03] saramhā asarūpā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā.
[03] cattāro'me bhikkhave dhammā, kinnu' māvasamaṇiyo. vāti kasmā? pañcindriyāni, tayassu dhammā jahitā bhavanti.
[03] saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṃ pappoti.
[03] saro kho paro pubbasare lutte kvaci dīghaṃ pappoti. saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, anāgārehi cūbhayaṃ.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kasmā? pañcahupāli aṅgehi samannāgato. natthaññaṃ kiñci.
[03] pubbo ca saro parasaralope kate kvaci dīghaṃ pappoti.

[03] okārukārānaṃ antabhūtānaṃ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti.
[03] atha khvassa, svassa hoti, bahvābādho, vatthvettha vihitaṃ niccaṃ cakkhāpāthamāgacchati.
[03] sabbo icceso ^b^ti^eb^saddo byañjano sare pare kvaci ^b^ca^eb^kāraṃ pappoti.

[03] sa sīlavā. sa paññavā esa dhammo sanantano, sa ve kasāvamarahati, sa mānakāmopi bhaveyya, sa ve muni jātibhayaṃ adassi.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti ^a^M0.0050^ea^ kasmā? so muni, eso dhammo padissati, na so kāsāvamarahati.

[03] ^b^ṭhāne^eb^ti kasmā? idha cetaso daḷhaṃ gaṇhāti thāmasā.
[03] niggahitaṃ kho byañjane pare aṃ iti hoti.
[03] vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahitaṃ kho vaggantaṃ vā pappoti.
[03] tanniccutaṃ, dhammañcare sucaritaṃ, cirappavāsiṃ purisaṃ. santantassa manaṃ hoti, taṅkāruṇikaṃ, evaṅkho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ.
[03] vāti kasmā? na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu.
[03] ekārahakāre pare niggahitaṃ kho ñakāraṃ pappoti vā.
[03] paccattaññeva parinibbāyissāmi, taññevettha paṭipucchissāmi, evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ. tañhi tassa musā hoti.

[03] niggahitassa kho sare pare ^b^ma^eb^kāra^b^da^eb^kārādesā honti vā.

[03] nayimassa vijjā, yathayidaṃ cittaṃ. migī bhantā vudikkhati, sittā te lahu messati, asittā te garu messati. asso ^a^M0.0053^ea^ bhadro kasāmiva, sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ. manasādaññā vimuttānaṃ, attadatthamabhiññāya. ciraṃnāyati, ito nāyati. yasmātiha bhikkhave, tasmātiha bhikkhave, ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ. sabbhireva samāsetha, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āraggā. chaḷabhiññā, saḷāyatanaṃ.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^ti kasmā? evaṃ mahiddhiyā esā, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ, ajini maṃ ahāsi me, ajeyyo anugāmiko.

[03] taṃ yathā? apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati upari pabbatā devo vassati, buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya bhikkhū ālapati temāsaṃ, ghatamassa telasmā pati dadāti, uppalamassa padumasmā pati dadāti, kanakamassa hiraññasmā pati dadāti.
[03] ^b^ādiggahaṇena^eb^ kārakamajjhepi pañcamīvibhatti hoti. ito pakkhasmā vijjhati migaṃ luddako, kosā vijjhati kuñjaraṃ, māsasmā bhuñjati bhojanaṃ.

[03] ^b^apiggahaṇena^eb^ nipātapayogepi pañcamīvibhatti hoti dutiyā ca tatiyā ca. rahitā mātujā puññaṃ katvā ^a^M0.0138^ea^ dānaṃ deti, rahitā mātujaṃ, rahitā mātujena vā. rite saddhammā kuto sukhaṃ labhati, rite saddhammaṃ, rite saddhammena vā. te bhikkhū nānā kulā pabbajitā, vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati, vinā saddhammaṃ, vinā saddhammena vā. vinā buddhasmā, vinā buddhaṃ, vinā buddhena vā.

[03] ^b^caggahaṇena^eb^ aññatthāpi pañcamīvibhatti hoti. yatohaṃ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jāto. yato sarāmi attānaṃ, yato pattosmi viññutaṃ, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā dhammā anvāsaveyyuṃ.
[03] rakkhaṇatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge yaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.

[03] dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, ārappayoge, suddhe, pamocane, hetvatthe, vivittatthe, pamāṇe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthe, guṇavacane, pañhe, kathane, thoke, akattari ca iccetesvatthesu, payogesu ca, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^dūratthe^eb^tāva -- kīva dūro ito naḷakāragāmo, dūrato vā gamma, ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā. dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, dūraṃ gāmaṃ āvato, dūrena gāmena vā āgato. ārakā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ, anena dhammavinayena vā iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^antikatthe^eb^ -- antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ saddhammā. dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, antikaṃ gāmaṃ, antikaṃ gāmena vā. āsannaṃ gāmaṃ, āsannaṃ gāmena vā. samīpaṃ gāmaṃ. samīpaṃ gāmena vā. samīpaṃ saddhammaṃ, samīpaṃ saddhammena vā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^addhanimmāne^eb^ ^a^M0.0140^ea^ -- ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṃ nāma nagaraṃ atthi, tattha bahū janā vasanti iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^kālanimmāne^eb^ -- ito bhikkhave ekanavutikappe vipassī nāma bhagavā loke udapādi, ito tiṇṇaṃ māsānaṃ accayena parinibbāyissati iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^tvālope^eb^ kammādhikaraṇesu -- pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā vā. pabbatā saṅkameyya, pabbataṃ abhiruhitvā vā. hatthikkhandhā saṅkameyya, hatthikkhandhaṃ abhiruhitvā vā. āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya. āsane nisīditvā vā iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^disāyoge^eb^ -- avicito yāva uparibhavaggamantare bahū sattanikāyā vasanti, yato khemaṃ tato bhayaṃ, puratthimato, dakkhiṇato, pacchimato, uttarato aggī pajjalanti, yato assosuṃ bhagavantaṃ, uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^vibhatte^eb^ -- yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi. chaṭṭhī ca, channavutīnaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ, dhammānaṃ pavaraṃ yadidaṃ sugatavinayo iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^ārappayoge^eb^ -- ^a^M0.0141^ea^ gāmadhammā vasaladhammā asaddhammā ārati virati paṭivirati, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^suddhe^eb^ -- lobhaniyehi dhammehi suddho asaṃsaṭṭho, mātito ca pitito ca suddho asaṃsaṭṭho anupakuddho agarahito iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^pamocane^eb^ -- parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, muttosmi mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^hetvatthe^eb^ -- kasmā hetunā, kena hetunā, kissa hetunā, kasmā nu tumhaṃ daharā na mīyare, kasmā idheva maraṇaṃ bhavissati iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^vivittatthe^eb^ -- vivitto pāpakā dhammā, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^pamāṇe^eb^ -- dīghaso navavidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā, majjhimassa purisassa aḍḍha teḷasahatthā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^bandhanatthe^eb^ -- satasmā bandho naro. tatiyā ca, satena bandho naro raññā iṇatthena iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^guṇavacane^eb^ ^a^M0.0142^ea^ -- puññāya sugatiṃ yanti, cāgāya vipulaṃ dhanaṃ, paññāya vimuttimano, issariyāya janaṃ rakkhati rājā iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^pañhe^eb^ tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu -- abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā, abhidhamme ṭhatvā vā. vinayā pucchanti, vinayaṃ sutvā, vinaye ṭhatvā vā. dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, abhidhammaṃ, abhidhammena vā. vinayaṃ, vinayena vā. eva suttā, geyyā, gāthāya, veyyākaraṇā, udānā, itivuttakā, jātakā, abbhutadhammā, vedallā iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^kathane^eb^ tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu -- abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā, abhidhamme ṭhatvā vā. vinayā kathayanti, vinayaṃ sutvā, vinaye ṭhatvā vā. dutiyā ca tatiyā ca, abhidhammaṃ, abhidhammena vā. vinayaṃ vinayena vā. evaṃ suttā, geyyā, gāthāya, veyyākaraṇā, udānā, itivuttakā, jātakā, abbhutadhammā, vedallā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^thoke^eb^ -- thokā muccanti. appamattakā muccanti, kicchā muccanti. tatiyā ca. thokena, appamattakena, kicchena vā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^akattarica^eb^ -- kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^caggahaṇena^eb^ ^a^M0.0143^ea^ sesesupi ye mayā nopadiṭṭhā apādānapayogikā, te payogavicakkhaṇehi yathāyogaṃ yojetabbā.
[03] 276, 302^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ^eb^.
[03] yassa vā dātukāmo yassa vārocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] samaṇassa cīvaraṃ dadāti, samaṇassa rocate saccaṃ, devadattassa suvaṇṇacchattaṃ dhārayate yaññadatto.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^ti vikappanatthaṃ, dhātunāmānaṃ payoge vā upasaggappayoge vā nipātappayoge vā sati atthavikappanatthaṃ ^b^vā^eb^ti padaṃ payujjati.

[03] 277, 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhissosūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇa pubbakattārocanattha tadattha tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini, gatyatthakammani, āsīsattha sammuti bhiyya sattamyatthesu ca^eb^.

[03] silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duha issaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge, usūyatthānañca payoge, rādhikkhappayoge, paccāsuṇānupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattari, ārocanatthe ^a^M0.0144^ea^, tadatthe, tumatthe, alamatthe, maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini, gatyatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ kammani, āsīsatthe ca sammuti bhiyya sattamyatthesu ca, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] ^b^silāghappayoge^eb^ tāva -- buddhassa silāghate, dhammassa silāghate, saṅghassa silāghate, sakaṃupajjhāyassa silāghate, tava silāghate mama silāghate iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^ṭhāpayoge^eb^ -- upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṃ vaḍḍhakī, bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya bhikkhunī iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^pihappayoge^eb^ -- buddhassa aññatitthiyā pihayanti, devā dassanakāmā te, yato icchāmi bhaddantassa, samiddhānaṃ pihayanti daliddā iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^kudhaduhaissausūyappayoge^eb^ -- kodhayati deva dattassa, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, mā raṭṭhaṃ vinassa idaṃ. duhayati ^a^M0.0145^ea^ disānaṃ megho, titthiyā samaṇānaṃ issayanti guṇagiddhena, titthiyā samaṇānaṃ issayanti lābhagiddhena, dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ usūyanti guṇagiddhena, kā usūyā vijānataṃ iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^rādha ikkha^eb^ iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge yassa akathitassa pucchanaṃ kammavikkhyāpanatthañca, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti, dutiyā ca.

[03] ārādhohaṃ rañño, ārādhohaṃ rājānaṃ, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, kyāhaṃ ayye aparajjhāmi, cakkhuṃ janassa dassanāya taṃ viya maññe, āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṃ vā iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattari suṇo^eb^tissa ^b^paccā^eb^yoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.

[03] ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti ^b^akathīta kammaṃ, etanti kathitakammaṃ^eb^. yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so`bhagavā'ti ``yo karoti sa kattā''ti suttavacanena kattusañño. evaṃ yassa ^a^M0.0146^ea^ kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
[03] taṃ yathā? te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū.
[03] ^b^giṇa^eb^ssa ^b^anupati^eb^yoge yassa kammuno pubbassa yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti.
[03] taṃ yathā? bhikkhu janaṃ dhammaṃ sāveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugiṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigiṇāti.
[03] ^b^ārocanatthe^eb^ -- ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave, ārocayāmi te mahārāja, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, paṭivedayāmi te mahārāja iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^tadatthe^eb^ -- ūnassa pāripūriyā taṃ cīvaraṃ nikkhipitabbaṃ. buddhassa atthāya, dhammassa atthāya, saṅghassa atthāya, jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^tumatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0147^ea^ -lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ buddho loke uppajjati. bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya vinayo paññatto iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^alamatthappayoge-ala^eb^miti arahati paṭikkhittesu. alaṃ me buddho, alaṃ me rajjaṃ, alaṃ bhikkhu pattassa, alaṃ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa. ^b^paṭikkhitte^eb^ alaṃ te rūpaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, alaṃ me hiraññasuvaṇṇena iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini^eb^-kaṭṭhassa tuvaṃ maññe, kaliṅgarassa tuvaṃ maññe.

[03] ^b^gatyatthakammani^eb^-gāmassa pādena gato, nagarassa pādena gato, appo saggāya gacchati, saggassa gamanena vā, mūlāya paṭikasseyya saṅgho. dutiyā ca, gāmaṃ pādena gato, nagaraṃ pādena gato, appo saggaṃ gacchati, saggaṃ gamanena vā, mūlaṃ paṭikasseyya saṅgho iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^āsīsatthe^eb^-āyasmato dīghāyuko hotu, bhaddaṃ bhavato hotu, kusalaṃ bhavato hotu, anāmayaṃ ^a^M0.0148^ea^ bhavato hotu, sukhaṃ bhavato hotu, svāgataṃ bhavato hotu, attho bhavato hotu, hitaṃ bhavato hotu iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^sammutippayoge^eb^-- aññatra saṅghasammutiyā bhikkhussa vippavatthuṃ na vaṭṭati, sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^sattamyatthe^eb^ -- tuyhañcassa āvi karomi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi iccevamādi.
[03] taṃ yathā? upamaṃ mata karissāmi, dhammaṃ vo desessāmi.

[03] ^b^sāratthe^eb^ ca -- desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ. tassa phāsu vihārāya hoti, etassa pahiṇeyya, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, tathāpi tesaṃ byākarissāma ^a^M0.0149^ea^, kappati samaṇānaṃ āyogo, amhākaṃ maṇinā attho, kimattho me buddhena, seyyo me attho, bahūpakārā bhante mahāpajā patigotamī bhagavato, bahūpakārā bhikkhave mātāpitaro puttānaṃ iccevamādi.
[03] sesesu akkharappayogesupi aññepi payogā payogavicakkhaṇehi yojetabbā.
[03] ^b^caggahaṇaṃ vikappanatthavāggahaṇānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ^eb^. ye keci saddā sampadānappayogikā mayā nopadiṭṭhā, tesaṃ gahaṇatthaṃ idha vikappīyati vāsaddo.

[03] taṃ yathā? bhikkhusaṅghassa pabhū ayaṃ bhagavā, desassa pabhū ayaṃ rājā. khettassa pabhū ayaṃ gahapati, araññassa pabhū ayaṃ luddako iccevamādi. kvaci dutiyā tatiyā pañcamī chaṭṭhī sattamyatthesu ca.
[03] yo ādhāro, taṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti. ^b^svādhāro catubbidho^eb^ byāpiko, opasilesiko, vesayiko sāmīpiko cāti.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0150^ea^ ^b^byāpiko^eb^ tāva--jalesu khīraṃ tiṭṭhati, tilesu telaṃ, ucchūsu raso.
[03] ^b^vesayiko^eb^--bhūmīsu manussā caranti, antalikkhe vāyū vāyanti. ākāse sakuṇā pakkhandanti.
[03] ^b^sāmīpiko^eb^--vane hatthino caranti, gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso tiṭṭhati, vaje gāvo duhanti, sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane.
[03] yena vā kayirate, yena vā passati, yena vā suṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] dattena vihiṃ lunāti, vāsiyā kaṭṭhaṃ tacchati, pharasunā rukkhaṃ chindati, kudālena pathaviṃ khaṇati, satthena kammaṃ karoti. cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati.
[03] yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā passati, yaṃ vā suṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] chattaṃ karoti, rathaṃ karoti, rūpaṃ passati, saddaṃ suṇāti, kaṇṭakaṃ maddati, visaṃ gilati.
[03] ahinā daṭṭho naro, garuḷena hato nāgo. buddhena jito māro, upaguttena māro bandho.
[03] yo kattāraṃ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā ca.
[03] so puriso taṃ purisaṃ kammaṃ kāreti so puriso tena purisena kammaṃ kāreti, so puriso tassa purisassa kammaṃ kāreti. evaṃ hāreti pāṭheti pāceti, dhāreti.
[03] ^b^hetu^eb^iccanena kvattho? dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
[03] yassa vā pariggaho, taṃ sāmīsaññaṃ hoti.
[03] tassa bhikkhuno paṭivīso, tassa bhikkhuno patto, tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ, attano mukhaṃ.
[03] puriso, purisā, eko, dve, ca, vā, he, ahe, re, are.
[03] ālapanatthā dhike liṅgatthābhidhānamatte ca paṭhamāvibhatti hoti.
[03] bho purisa, bhavanto purisā, bho rāja, bhavanto rājāno, he sakhe, he sakhino.
[03] agginā kuṭiṃ jhāpeti, manasā ce paduṭṭhena, manasā ce pasannena, kāyena kammaṃ karoti.
[03] sahāpi gaggena saṅgho uposathaṃ kareyya, vināpi gaggena, mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ, sahassena samaṃ mitā.
[03] raññā hato poso, yakkhena dinno varo, ahinā daṭṭho naro.
[03] annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati, sakkārena vasati.
[03] tena ^a^M0.0154^ea^ kālena, tena samayena. (yena kālena, yena samayena,) tena kho pana samayena.
[03] yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate. tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
[03] akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, kāṇaṃ passati nettena, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
[03] gottena gotamo nātho, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo, tapasā uttamo.
[03] buddhassa vā dhammassa vā saṅghassa vā dānaṃ deti, dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā.
[03] namo ^a^M0.0155^ea^ te buddha vīratthu, sotthi pajānaṃ, namo karohi nāgassa, svāgataṃ te mahārāja.
[03] pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye, abbhā muttova candimā, bhayā muccati so naro.
[03] ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanā.
[03] gāvaṃ hanati, vīhayo lunāti, satthaṃ karoti, ghaṭaṃ karoti, rathaṃ karoti, dhammaṃ suṇāti, buddhaṃ pūjeti, vācaṃ bhāsatī, taṇḍulaṃ vacati, coraṃ ghāteti.
[03] māsaṃ ^a^M0.0156^ea^ maṃsodanaṃ bhuñjati, saradaṃ ramaṇīyā nadī, māsaṃ sajjhāyati, yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
[03] taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, pabbajitamanupabbajiṃ^b^su^eb^.
[03] 300, 286^b^.^eb^ ^b^gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṃ kārite vā^eb^.
[03] ^b^gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayā^eb^dīnaṃ payoge kārite dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā.
[03] puriso purisaṃ (gāmaṃ) gāmayati, puriso purisena vā, puriso purisassa vā. evaṃ bodhayati, bhojayati, pāṭhayati, hārayati, kārayati, sayāpayati. evaṃ sabbattha kārite.
[03] tassa ^a^M0.0157^ea^ bhikkhuno paṭivīso, tassa bhikkhuno patto, tassa bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ, attano mukhaṃ.
[03] gambhīre odakantike, pāpasmiṃ ramati mano, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ vussati kulaputto.
[03] ^b^sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhīpatibhū pasutakusala i^eb^ccetehi payoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.

[03] goṇānaṃ sāmī, goṇesu sāmī, goṇānaṃ issaro, goṇesu issaro. goṇānaṃ adhipati, goṇesu adhipati. goṇānaṃ dāyādo, goṇesu dāyādo. goṇānaṃ sakkhī, goṇesu sakkhī, goṇānaṃ patibhū, goṇesu patibhū. goṇānaṃ pasuto, goṇesu pasuto. goṇānaṃ kusalo, goṇesu kusalo.
[03] niddhāraṇatthe ca chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.

[03] kaṇhā ^a^M0.0158^ea^ gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā, kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā. sāmā nārīnaṃ dassanīyatamā, sāmā nārīsu dassanīyatamā. manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo. pathikānaṃ dhāvanto sīghatamo, pathikesu dhāvanto sīghatamo.
[03] rudato dārakassa pabbaji, rudantasmiṃ dārake pabbaji.
[03] apissu maṃ aggivessana tisso upamā paṭibhaṃsu.
[03] tatiyāsattamīnaṃ atthe ca kvaci dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
[03] sace maṃ samaṇo gotamo ālapissati, tvañca maṃ nābhibhāsasi. evaṃ tatiyatthe.
[03] pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā. evaṃ sattamyatthe.
[03] tatiyāsattamīnaṃ atthe ca kvaci chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti.
[03] kato me kalyāṇo, kataṃ me pāpaṃ. evaṃ tatiyatthe.
[03] kusalā naccagītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyo, kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ. evaṃ sattamyatthe.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kimatthaṃ? yo vo ānanda mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, ānando atthesu vicakkhaṇo.
[03] tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro, evaṃ dutiyatthe.

[03] assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, kinnu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto catunnaṃ āsīvisānaṃ ghoravisānaṃ, bhāyāmi ghoravisassa nāgassa. evaṃ pañcamyatthe.
[03] sundarāvuso ime ājīvakā bhikkhūsu abhivādenti. evaṃ kammatthe.
[03] hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti. evaṃ karaṇatthe.
[03] dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, evaṃ nimittatthe.
[03] saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphala, saṅghe gotamī dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
[03] kālabhāvesu ca kattari payujjamāne sattamīvibhatti hoti.
[03] pubbaṇhasamaye ^a^M0.0161^ea^ gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato. bhikkhūsu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato. gosuduyhamānesu gato, duddhāsu āgato.
[03] upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ. adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, adhi naccesu gotamī, adhi devesu buddho.
[03] ñāṇena pasīdito, ñāṇasmiṃ vā pasīdito, ñāṇena ussukko, ñāṇasmiṃ vā ussukko tathāgato vā tathāgatagotto vā.
[03] tesaṃ nāmānaṃ payujjamānapadatthānaṃ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti.
[03] kathinadussaṃ, āgantukabhattaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ, samaṇabrāhmaṇā, sāriputtamoggallānā, brāhmaṇa gahapatikā.
[03] tesaṃ yuttatthānaṃ samāsānaṃ vibhattiyo lopā ca honti.
[03] ^b^tesaṃgahaṇena^eb^ samāsataddhitākhyātakitakānaṃ vibhattipaccayapadakkharāgamā ca lopā honti. vāsiṭṭho, venateyyo.
[03] luttāsu vibhattīsu assa sarantassa liṅgassa pakatirūpāni honti.

[03] nagarassa ^a^M0.0164^ea^ samīpe pavattati kathā iti upanagaraṃ, darathānaṃ abhāvo niddarathaṃ, makasānaṃ abhāvo nimmakasaṃ, vuḍḍhānaṃ paṭipāṭi yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, ye ye vuḍḍhā vā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, jīvassa yattako paricchedo yāvajīvaṃ, cittamadhikicca pavattanti te dhammāti adhicittaṃ, pabbatassa tiro tiropabbataṃ, sotassa pati pavattati nāvā iti patisotaṃ, pāsādassa anto antopāsādaṃ.
[03] kumārīsu adhikicca pavattati kathā iti adhikumāri, vadhuyā samīpe pavattati kathā iti upavadhu, gaṅgāya samīpe pavattati kathā iti upagaṅgaṃ, maṇikāya samīpe pavattati kathā iti upamaṇikaṃ.
[03] tayo ^a^M0.0165^ea^ lokā tilokaṃ, tayo daṇḍā tidaṇḍaṃ, tīṇi nayanāni tinayanaṃ, tayo siṅgā tisiṅgaṃ. catasso disā catuddisaṃ, pañca indriyāni pañcindriyaṃ.
[03] 322, 359^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yoggasenaṅgakhuddajantuka vividhaviruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca^eb^.
[03] tathā dvande samāse ^b^pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgakhuddajantuka vividhaviruddha visabhāgattha^eb^iccevamādīnaṃ ekattaṃ hoti, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca.
[03] taṃ yathā? cakkhu ca sotañca cakkhusotaṃ, mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṃ, chavi ca maṃsañca lohitañca chavimaṃsalohitaṃ. evaṃ ^b^pāṇyaṅgatthe^eb^.
[03] saṅkho ca paṇavo ca saṅkhapaṇavaṃ, gītañca vāditañca gītavāditaṃ, daddari ca ḍiṇḍimo ca daddariḍiṇḍimaṃ. evaṃ ^b^tūriyaṅgatthe^eb^.
[03] phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ. evaṃ ^b^yoggaṅgatthe^eb^.
[03] asi ca cammañca asicammaṃ, dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṃ, hatthī ca asso ca hatthiassaṃ, ratho ca pattiko ca rathapattikaṃ. evaṃ ^b^senaṅgatthe^eb^.
[03] ḍaṃsā ^a^M0.0166^ea^ ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ, kuntho ca kipilliko ca kunthakipillikaṃ, kīṭo ca sarīsapo ca kīṭasarīsapaṃ. evaṃ ^b^khuddajantukatthe^eb^.
[03] ahi ca nakulo ca ahinakulaṃ, biḷāro ca mūsiko ca biḷāramūsikaṃ, kāko ca ulūko ca kākolūkaṃ. evaṃ ^b^vividhaviruddhatthe^eb^.
[03] sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṃ, vijjā ca caraṇañca vijjācaraṇaṃ. evaṃ ^b^visabhāgatthe^eb^.

[03] ^b^ādiggahaṇaṃ^eb^ kimatthaṃ? dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṃ, itthī ca pumā ca itthipumaṃ, patto ca cīvarañca pattacīvaraṃ, chattañca upāhanā ca chattupāhanaṃ, tikañca catukkañca tikacatukkaṃ, veno ca rathakāro ca venarathakāraṃ, sākuṇiko ca māgaviko ca savakuṇikamāgavikaṃ, dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ iccevamādi.
[03] 323, 360^b^.^eb^ ^b^vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasukha na dhañña janapadādīnañca^eb^.

[03] ^b^rukkhatiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapada^eb^iccevamādīnaṃ vibhāsā ekattaṃ hoti, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca dvande samāse. assattho ^a^M0.0167^ea^ ca kapītano ca assatthakapītanaṃ, assatthakapītanā vā. usīrañca bīraṇañca usīrabīraṇaṃ, usīrabīraṇā vā. ajo ca eḷako ca ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā vā. hiraññañca suvaṇṇañca hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇā vā. sāli ca yavo ca sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā vā. kāsī ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṃ, kāsikosalā vā.
[03] ^b^ādiggahaṇaṃ^eb^ kimatthaṃ? sāvajjañca anavajjañca sāvajjānavajjaṃ, sāvajjā navajjā vā. hīnañca paṇītañca hīnapaṇītaṃ. hīnapaṇītā vā. kaṇho ca sukko ca kaṇhasukkaṃ, kaṇhasukkā vā.
[03] dve padāni tulyādhikaraṇāni yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso ^b^kammadhāraya^eb^sañño hoti.

[03] mahanto ^a^M0.0168^ea^ ca so puriso cāti mahāpuriso, kaṇho ca so sappo cāti kaṇhasappo, nīlañca taṃ uppalañcāti nīluppalaṃ, lohitañca taṃ candanañcāti lohitacandanaṃ, brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā, khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti khattiyakaññā.
[03] tīṇi malāni timalaṃ, tīṇi phalāni tiphalaṃ, tayo lokā tilokaṃ, tayo daṇḍā tidaṇḍaṃ, catasso disā catuddisaṃ, pañca indriyāni pañcindriyaṃ, satta godāvariyo sattagodāvaraṃ.

[03] na brāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, na vasalo avasalo, na bhikkhu abhikkhu, na pañcavassaṃ apañcavassaṃ, na ^a^M0.0169^ea^ pañcapūlī apañcapūlī, na sattagodāvaraṃasattagodāvaraṃ, na dasagavaṃ adasagavaṃ, na pañcagavaṃ apañcagavaṃ.
[03] tā amādayo nāmehi parapadebhi yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso ^b^tappurisa^eb^sañño hoti.

[03] bhūmiṃ gato bhūmigato, sabbarattiṃ sobhaṇo sabbarattisobhaṇo. apāyaṃ gato apāyagato, issarena kataṃ issarakataṃ, sallena viddho sallaviddho, kathinassa dussaṃ kathinadussaṃ, āgantukassa bhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ, methunā apeto methunāpeto, corā bhayaṃ corabhayaṃ, rañño putto rājaputto, dhaññānaṃ rāsi dhaññarāsi, rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, saṃsāre dukkhaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ.
[03] aññesaṃ padānaṃ atthesu dve nāmāni bahūni nāmāni yadā samasyante, tadā so samāso ^b^bahubbīhi^eb^ sañño hoti.

[03] āgatā ^a^M0.0170^ea^ samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ soyaṃ āgatasamaṇo, saṅghārāmo. jitāni indriyāni anena samaṇena soyaṃ jitindriyo, samaṇo. dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṃ dinnasuṅko, rājā. niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṃ niggatajano, gāmo. chinno hatto yassa purisassa soyaṃ chinnahattho, puriso. sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ sampannasasso, janapado.

[03] nigrodhassa parimaṇḍalo nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo, nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṃ nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo. atha vā nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo iva parimaṇḍalo yassa rājakumārassa soyaṃ nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo, rājakumāro.
[03] cakkhuno bhūto cakkhubhūto, cakkhubhūto iva bhūto yo bhagavā soyaṃ cakkhubhūto, bhagavā.
[03] suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa bhagavato soyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, bhagavā.
[03] brahmuno saro brahmassaro, brahmassaro viya saro yassa bhagavato soyaṃ brahmassaro, bhagavā.

[03] ^b^sayaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0171^ea^ ^b^patita paṇṇa pupphaphalavāyutoyāhārā^eb^ti paṇṇañca pupphañca phalañca paṇṇapupphaphalāni, sayameva patitāni sayaṃpatitāni, sayaṃpatitāni ca tāni paṇṇapupphaphalāni ceti sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalāni vāyu ca toyañca vāyutoyāni, sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalāni ca vāyutoyāni ca sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyāni. sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyāni āhārā yesaṃ te sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyāhārā, isayo. yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ayaṃ pana dvandakammadhārayagabbho tulyādhikaraṇapahubbīhi.
[03] atha vā -- sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyehi āhārā yesaṃ te sayaṃpatitapaṇṇapupphaphalavāyutoyāhārā. ayaṃ pana bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^nānā dumapatita pupphavāsita sānū^eb^ti nānāpakārā dumā nānādumā, nānādumehi patitāni nānādumapati tāni, nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni ceti nānādumapatitapupphāni, nānādumapatitapupphehi vāsitā nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā, nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu, pabbatarājā. ayaṃ pana kammadhārayatappurisagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] atha ^a^M0.0172^ea^ vā -- vāsitā sānū vāsitasānu, sāpekkhatte satipi gamakattā samāso. nānādumapatitapupphehi vāsitasānū yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu, pabbatarājā. ayaṃ pana bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo^eb^ti ambuṃ dhāretīti ambudharo, ko so? pajjunno. vividhā ālambo byālambo, byālambo ca so ambudharo cāti byālambambudharo, byālambambudharassa bindū byālambambudharabindū, byālambambudharabindūhi cumbito byālambambudharabinducumbito, byālambamburebinducumbito kūṭo yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo. ayaṃ pana kammadhārayatappurisagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] atha vā -- cumbito kūṭo cumbitakūṭo, sāpekkhatte satipi gamakattā samāso. byālambambudharabindūhi cumbitakūṭo yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo. ayaṃ pana bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^amita bala parakkamajutī^eb^ti na mitā amitā, balañca parakkamo ca juti ca balaparakkamajutiyo, amitā balaparakkamajutiyo yassa soyaṃ amitabalaparakkamajuti, ayaṃ pana kammadhārayadvandagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^pīṇorakkhaṃsa^eb^ ^a^M0.0173^ea^ ^b^bāhū^eb^ti uro ca akkhañca aṃso ca bāhu ca urakkhaṃsabāhavo, pīṇā urakkhaṃsabāhavo yassa bhagavato soyaṃ pīṇorakkhaṃsabāhu. ayaṃ pana dvandavabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^pīṇa gaṇḍa vadana thanūrujaghanā^eb^ti gaṇḍo ca vadanañca thano ca ūru ca jaghanañca gaṇḍavadanathanūrujaghanā, pīṇā gaṇḍavadanathanūrujaghanā yassā sāyaṃ pīṇagaṇḍavadanathanūrujaghanā. ayampi dvandagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^vavara surāsura garuḍa manuja bhujaga gandhabba makuṭa kūṭa cumbita selasaṅghaṭṭita caraṇo^eb^ti surā ca asurā ca garuḍā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā ca surāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbā, pavarā ca te surāsuragaruḍamanujabhujaga gandhabbā ceti pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbā, pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbānaṃ makuṭāni pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭāni, pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭānaṃ kūṭāni pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭāni, pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭesu cumbitā pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitā, pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitā ca te selā cāti pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselā, pavarasurāsura garuḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselehi saṅghaṭṭitā pavarasurāsura garuḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselasaṅghaṭṭitā, pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselasaṅghaṭṭitā caraṇā yassa tathāgatassa soyaṃ ^a^M0.0174^ea^ pavarasurāsuragaruḍamanujabhujagagandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselasaṅghaṭṭitacaraṇo, tathāgato, ayaṃ pana dvandakammadhārayatappurisagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] atha vā--saṅghaṭṭitā caraṇā saṅghaṭṭitacaraṇā, sāpekkhatte satipi gamakattā samāso. pavarasurāsura garuḍamanujabhujaga gandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselehi saṅghaṭṭitacaraṇā yassa tathāgatassa soyaṃ pavarasurāsuragaruḍa manujabhujaga gandhabbamakuṭakūṭacumbitaselasaṅghaṭṭita caraṇo. ayaṃ pana bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.
[03] ^b^catuddiso^eb^ti catasso disā yassa soyaṃ catuddiso, bhagavā.
[03] ^b^pañcacakkhū^eb^ti pañca cakkhūni yassa tathāgatassa soyaṃ pañcacakkhu, tathāgato.
[03] ^b^dasabalo^eb^ti dasa balāni yassa soyaṃ dasabalo, bhagavā.
[03] ^b^anantañāṇo^eb^ti nassa anto anantaṃ, anantaṃ ñāṇaṃ yassa tathāgatassa soyaṃ anantañāṇo, tathāgato.
[03] ^b^amita ghana sarīro^eb^ti na mitaṃ amitaṃ, ghanaṃ eva sarīraṃ ghanasarīraṃ, amitaṃ ghanasarīraṃ yassa tathāgatassa soyaṃ amitaghanasarīro, tathāgato.

[03] ^b^amita bala parakkama patto^eb^ti na mitā amitā, balañca parakkamo ca balaparakkamā, amitā eva balaparakkamā amitabalaparakkamā ^a^M0.0175^ea^, amitabalaparakkamā pattā yena soyaṃ amitabalaparakkamapatto, bhagavā. ayaṃ pana kammadhārayadvandagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^matta bhamara gaṇa cumbita vikasitapupphavallināgarukkho pasobhita kandaro^eb^ti mattā eva bhamarā mattabhamarā, mattabhamarānaṃ gaṇā mattabhamaragaṇā, mattabhamaragaṇehi cumbitāni mattabhamaraṇacumbitāni, vikasitāni eva pupphāni vikasitapupphāni, mattabhamaragaṇacumbitāni vikasitapupphāni yesaṃ tehi mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphā, valli ca nāgarukkho ca mallināgarukkhā, mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphā ca te vallināgarukkhā ceti mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphavallināgarukkhā, mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphavallināgarukkhehi upasobhitāni mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphavallināgarukkho pasobhitāni, mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphavallināgarukkho pasobhitāni kandarāni yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapuppha vallināgarukkho paso bhitakandaro, pabbatarājā. ayaṃ pana dvandakammadhārayatappurisagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] atha vā--upasobhitāni kandarāni upasobhitakandarāni, sāpekkhatte satipi gamakattā samāso. mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphavallināgarukkhehi upasobhitakandarāni yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ mattabhamaragaṇacumbitavikasitapupphavallināgarukkho pasobhitakandaro, pabbatarājā. ayaṃ pana bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^nānā^eb^ ^a^M0.0176^ea^ ^b^rukkha tiṇa patita pupphopasobhita kandaro^eb^ti rukkho ca tiṇañca rukkhatiṇāni, nānā pakārāni eva rukkhatiṇāni nānārukkhatiṇāni, nānārukkhatiṇehi patitāni nānārukkhatiṇapatitāni, nānārukkhatiṇapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni ceti nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphāni, nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphehi upasobhitāni nānārukkhatiṇapatita pupphopasobhitāni, nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphopasobhitāni kandarāni yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphopasobhitakandaro, pabbatarājā. ayaṃ pana dvandakammadhārayatappurisagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] atha vā--upasobhitāni eva kandarāni upasobhitakandarāni, (sāpekkhatte satipi gamakattā samāso.) nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphehi upasobhitakandarāni yassa pabbatarājassa soyaṃ nānārukkhatiṇapatitapupphopasobhitakandaro, pabbatarājā. ayaṃ pana bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] ^b^nānā musala phāla pabbata taru kaliṅgara sara dhanugadāsi tomarahatthā^eb^ti musalo ca phālo ca pabbato ca taru ca kaliṅgaro ca saro ca dhanu ca gadā cāsi ca tomaro, ca musalaphālapabbatatarukaliṅgarasaradhanugadāsitomarā, nānā pakārā eva musalaphālapabbatatarukaliṅgarasaradhanugadāsitomarā nānāmusalaphālapabbatatarukaliṅgarasaradhanugadāsitomarā, nānāmusalaphālapabbatatarukaliṅgarasaradhanugadāsitomarā hatthesu ^a^M0.0177^ea^ yesaṃ te nānāmusalaphālapabbatatarukaliṅgara saradhanugadāsitomarahatthā. ayaṃ pana dvandakammadhārayagabbho bhinnādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.
[03] nāmānaṃ ekavibhattikānaṃ yo samuccayo, so dvandasañño hoti.

[03] candimā ca sūriyo ca candimasūriyā, samaṇo ca brāhmaṇo ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā, sāriputto ca moggallāno ca sāriputtamoggallānā, brāhmaṇo ca gahapatiko ca brāhmaṇagahapatikā, yamo ca varuṇo ca yamavaruṇā, kuvero ca vāsavo ca kuveravāsavā.

[03] mahanto ^a^M0.0178^ea^ ca so puriso cāti mahāpuriso, mahantī ca sā devī cāti mahādevī, mahantañca taṃ balañcāti mahābalaṃ, mahanto ca so nāgo cāti mahānāgo, mahanto ca so yaso cāti mahāyaso, mahantañca taṃ padumavanañcāti mahāpadumavanaṃ, mahantī ca sā nadī cāti mahānadī, mahanto ca so maṇi cāti mahāmaṇi, mahanto ca so gahapatiko cāti mahāgahapatiko, mahantañca taṃ dhanañcāti mahādhanaṃ, mahanto ca so puñño cāti mahāpuñño.
[03] ^b^bahuvacanaggahaṇena^eb^ kvaci ^b^mahanta^eb^ saddassa ^b^mahā^eb^deso hoti. mahantañca taṃ phalañcāti mahapphalaṃ, mahabbalaṃ, evaṃ mahaddhanaṃ, mahabbhayaṃ.
[03] itthiyaṃ tulyādhikaraṇe pade ce bhāsitapumitthī pumāva daṭṭhabbā.
[03] dīghā jaṅghā yassa soyaṃ dīghajaṅgho, kalyāṇabhariyo, pahūtapañño.
[03] ^b^bhāsitapupe^eb^ti ^a^M0.0179^ea^ kimatthaṃ? brāhmaṇabandhu ca sā bhariyā cātibrāhmaṇabandhubhariyā.
[03] kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṃ tulyādhikaraṇe pade pubbe bhāsitapumitthī ce, pumāva daṭṭhabbā. brāhmaṇadārikā, khattiyakaññā, khattiyakumārikā.
[03] nassa padassa tappurise uttarapade attaṃ hoti.
[03] nabrāhmaṇo abrāhmaṇo, avasalo, abhikkhu, apañcavassaṃ, apañcagavaṃ.
[03] nassa padassa tappurise ^b^ana^eb^ ādeso hoti sare pare.
[03] kucchitaṃ annaṃ kadannaṃ, kucchitaṃ asanaṃ kadassanaṃ.
[03] ^b^sare^eb^ti kimatthaṃ? kucchitā dārā yesaṃ (apuññakārānaṃ) te hontīti kudārā, kujanā. evaṃ kuputtā, kugehā, kuvatthā, kudāsā.
[03] devānaṃ rājā devarājo, devarājā, devānaṃ sakhā devasakho, devasakhā, pañca ahāni pañcāhaṃ, sattāhaṃ, pañcagavaṃ, chattupāhanaṃ, upasaradaṃ, visālakkho, vimukho.

[03] ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0181^ea^ kimatthaṃ? ^b^ā^eb^kāranta ikārantā ca honti, paccakkhā dhammā yassa soyanti paccakkhadhammā, surabhino gandho surabhigandhi, sundaro gandho sugandhi, pūtino gandho pūtigandhi, kucchito gandho kugandhi, duṭṭhu gandho yassa soyanti dugandhi, pūti eva gandho pūtigandhi.
[03] bahū nadiyo yasmiṃ soyaṃ bahunadiko, janapado. bahavo kattāro yassa soyaṃ bahukattuko, puriso.
[03] bahū nadiyo yasmiṃ soyanti bahunadiko. bahū kantiyo yassa soyanti bahukantiko. bahunāriko.
[03] tasmā ^b^a^eb^kārantā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ kvaci ^b^aṃ^eb^ hoti.
[03] adhicittaṃ, yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, upakumbhaṃ, yāvajīvaṃ, tiropabbataṃ, tiropākāraṃ, tirokuṭṭaṃ, antopāsādaṃ.
[03] napuṃsake vattamānassa abyayībhāvasamāsassa liṅgassa saro rasso hoti.
[03] kumārīsu adhikicca pavattati kathā iti adhikumāri. upavadhu, upagaṅgaṃ, upamaṇikaṃ.
[03] aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā anakārantā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo ca hoti.

[03] vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭho, vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vā, vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭhī, vasiṭṭhassa apaccaṃ vāsiṭṭhaṃ. evaṃ bhāradvājo, bhāradvājī, bhāradvājaṃ. gotamo, gotamī, gotamaṃ. vāsudevo, vāsudevī, vāsudevaṃ. bāladevo, bāladevī, bāladevaṃ. vesāmitto, vesāmittī vesāmittaṃ.

[03] vacchassa apaccaṃvacchāyano, vacchāno, vacchassa apaccaṃ vā, vacchassa apaccaṃ vacchāyanī, vacchānī, vacchassa apaccaṃ vacchāyanaṃ, vacchānaṃ. sakaṭassa apaccaṃ sākaṭāyano, sākaṭāno ^a^M0.0184^ea^, sakaṭassa apaccaṃ vā, sākaṭāyanī, sā kaṭānī, sākaṭāyanaṃ, sākaṭānaṃ. evaṃ kaṇhāyano, kaṇhāno, kaṇhassa apaccaṃ vā. kaṇhāyanī, kaṇhānī, kaṇhāyanaṃ, kaṇhānaṃ. aggivessāyano, aggivessāno, aggivessāyanī, aggivessānī, aggivessāyanaṃ, aggivessānaṃ. gacchāyano, gacchāno, gacchāyanī, gacchānī, gacchāyanaṃ, gacchānaṃ. kappāyano, kappāno, kappāyanī, kappānī, kappāyanaṃ, kappānaṃ. moggallāyano, moggallāno, moggallāyanī, moggallānī, moggallāyanaṃ, moggallānaṃ. muñcāyano, muñcāno, muñcāyanī, muñcānī, muñcāyanaṃ, muñcānaṃ. saṅghāyano, saṅghāno, saṅghāyanī, saṅghānī, saṅghāyanaṃ, saṅghānaṃ. lomāyano, lomāno, lomāyanī, lomānī, lomāyanaṃ, lomānaṃ, sākamāyano, sākamāno, sākamāyanī, sākamānī, sākamāyanaṃ, sākamānaṃ. nārāyano, nārāno, nārāyanī, nārānī, nārāyanaṃ, nārānaṃ. corāyanocorāno, corāyanī, corānī, corāyanaṃ, corānaṃ, āvasālāyano, āvasālāno, āvasālāyanī, āvasālānī, āvasālāyanaṃ, āvasālānaṃ. dvepāyano, dvepāno, dvepāyanī, dvepānī, dvepāyanaṃ, dvepānaṃ. kuñcāyano, kuñcāno, kuñcāyanī, kuñcānī, kuñcāyanaṃ, kuñcānaṃ. kaccāyano, kaccāno, kaccāyanī, kaccānī, kaccāyanaṃ, kaccānaṃ.
[03] kattikāya apaccaṃ kattikeyyo, kattikāya apaccaṃ vā. evaṃ venateyyo, rohiṇeyyo, gaṅgeyyo, kaddameyyo, nādeyyo, āleyyo, āheyo, kāmeyyo, suciyā apaccaṃ soceyyo, sāleyyo, bāleyyo, māleyyo, kāleyyo.

[03] dakkhassa apaccaṃ dakkhi, dakkhassa apaccaṃ vā. duṇassa apaccaṃ doṇi, duṇassa apaccaṃ vā, evaṃ vāsavi, sakyaputti, nāṭaputti, dāsaputti, dāsavi, vāruṇi, gaṇḍi, bāladevi, pāvaki, jenadatti, buddhi, dhammi, saṅghi, kappi, anuruddhi.
[03] ^b^vāti vikappanatthena ṇika^eb^paccayo hoti ``tassāpacca''miccetasmiṃ atthe. sakyaputtassa apaccaṃ sakyaputtiko. evaṃ nāṭaputtiko, jenadattiko.

[03] upakussa apaccaṃ opakavo, upakussa apaccaṃ vā. manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, manuno apaccaṃ vā. bhaggussa apaccaṃ bhaggavo, bhaggussa apaccaṃ vā, paṇḍussa apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, paṇḍussa apaccaṃ vā, bahussa apaccaṃ bāhavo, bahussa apaccaṃ vā.

[03] vidhavāya apaccaṃ vedhavero, vidhavāya apaccaṃ vā. bandhukiyā apaccaṃ bandhukero, bandhukiyā apaccaṃ vā. samaṇassa apaccaṃ sāmaṇero, samaṇassa apaccaṃ vā. evaṃ sāmaṇerī, sāmaṇeraṃ, nāḷikero, nāḷikerī, nāḷikeraṃ.
[03] 350, 373^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko^eb^.
[03] yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, yena vā tarati, yena vā carati, yena vā vahati iccetesvatthesu ^b^ṇika^eb^paccayo hoti vā.
[03] tilena ^a^M0.0187^ea^ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ bhojanaṃ telikaṃ, tilena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ vā. evaṃ goḷikaṃ, ghātikaṃ.
[03] nāvāya taratīti nāviko, nāvāya tarati vā. evaṃ oḷumpiko.
[03] sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko, sakaṭena carati vā. evaṃ pattiko, daṇḍiko, dhammiko, pādiko.
[03] sīsena vahatīti sīsiko, sīsena vahati vā. aṃsena vahatīti aṃsiko, aṃsena vahati vā. evaṃ khandhiko, aṅguliko.

[03] ^b^vāti vikappanatthena^eb^ aññesupi ^b^ṇika^eb^paccayo hoti. rājagahe vasatīti rājagahiko, rājagahe vasati vā. rājagahe jāto rājagahiko, rājagahe jāto vā. evaṃ māgadhiko, sāvatthiko, kāpila vatthiko, pāṭaliputtiko, vesāliko.
[03] 351, 374^b^.^eb^ ^b^tamadhīte tenakatādi sannidhāna niyoga sippa bhaṇḍa jīvikatthesu ca^eb^.
[03] tamadhīte, tenakatādiatthe, tamhi sannidhānā, tattha niyutto, tamassa sippaṃ, tamassa bhaṇḍaṃ, tamassa jīvikaṃ iccetesvatthesu ca ^b^ṇika^eb^paccayo hoti vā.
[03] vinayamadhīte ^a^M0.0188^ea^ venayiko, vinayamadhīte vā. evaṃ suttantiko, ābhidhammiko, veyyākaraṇiko.
[03] kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyikaṃ, kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ vā. evaṃ vācasikaṃ, mānasikaṃ.
[03] sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sarīre sannidhānā vā, evaṃ mānasikā.
[03] dvāre niyutto dovāriko, dvāre niyutto vā. evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, nāgariko, nāvakammiko.
[03] vīṇā assa sippaṃ veṇiko, vīṇā assa sippaṃ vā. evaṃ pāṇaviko, modiṅgiko, vaṃsiko.
[03] gandho assa bhaṇḍaṃ gandhiko, gandho assa bhaṇḍaṃ vā. evaṃ teliko, goḷiko.
[03] urabbhaṃ hantvā jīvatīti orabbhiko, urabbhaṃ hantvā jīvati vā. magaṃ hantvā jīvatīti māgaviko, magaṃ hantvā jīvati vā. evaṃ sokariko, sākuṇiko.
[03] ^b^ādiggahaṇena^eb^ aññatthāpi ^b^ṇika^eb^ paccayo yojetabbo. jālena hato jāliko, jālena hato vā.
[03] suttena bandho suttiko, suttena bandho vā.
[03] cāpo ^a^M0.0189^ea^ assa āvudho cāpiko, cāpo assa āvudho vā. evaṃ tomariko, muggariko, mosaliko.
[03] vāto assa ābādho vātiko, vāto assa ābādho vā. evaṃ semhiko, pittiko.
[03] buddhe pasanno buddhiko, buddhe pasanno vā. evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko.
[03] buddhassa santakaṃ buddhikaṃ, buddhassa santakaṃ vā. evaṃ dhammikaṃ, saṅghikaṃ.
[03] vatthena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vatthikaṃ, vatthena kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vā. evaṃ kumbhikaṃ, phālikaṃ, kiṃ kaṇikaṃ, sovaṇṇikaṃ.
[03] kumbho assa parimāṇaṃ kumbhikaṃ, kumbho assa parimāṇaṃ vā.
[03] kumbhassa rāsi kumbhikaṃ, kumbhassa rāsi vā.
[03] kumbhaṃ arahatīti kumbhiko, kumbhaṃ arahati vā.
[03] akkhena dibbatīti akkhiko, akkhena dibbati vā. evaṃ sālākiko, tindukiko, ambaphaliko. kapiṭṭhaphaliko, nāḷikeriko iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^ṇa^eb^paccayo hoti vā rāgamhā ``tena rattaṃ'' iccetasmiṃ atthe, ``tassedaṃ'' aññatthesu ca.
[03] kasāvena ^a^M0.0190^ea^ rattaṃ vatthaṃ kāsāvaṃ, kasāvena rattaṃ vatthaṃ vā. evaṃ kosumbhaṃ, hāliddaṃ, pāṭaṅgaṃ, rattaṅga, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ.
[03] sūkarassa idaṃ maṃsaṃ sokaraṃ, sūkarassa idaṃ maṃsaṃ vā. evaṃ māhisaṃ.
[03] udumbarassa avidūre pavattaṃ vimānaṃ odumbaraṃ, udumbarassa avidūre pavattaṃ vimānaṃ vā.
[03] vidisāya avidūre nivāso vediso, vidisāya avidūre nivāso vā.
[03] mathurāya jāto māthuro, mathurāya jāto vā.
[03] mathurāya āgato māthuro, mathurāya āgato vā.
[03] kattikāya niyutto māso kattiko, kattikāya niyutto māso vā. evaṃ māgasiro, phusso, māgho, phagguno, citto, vesākho, jeṭṭho, āsaḷho, sāvaṇo, bhaddo, assayujo.
[03] sikkhānaṃ ^a^M0.0191^ea^ samūho sikkho, bhikkhānaṃ samūho bhikkho. evaṃ kāpoto, māyūro, kokilo.
[03] buddhe, assa devatā buddho. evaṃ bhaddo, māro, māhindo, vessavaṇo, yāmo, somo, nārāyaṇo.
[03] saṃvaccharamadhīte saṃvaccharo. evaṃ mohutto, nemitto, aṅgavijjo, veyyākaraṇo, chando, bhāsso, cando.
[03] vasādānaṃ visayo deso vāsādo. evaṃ kumbho, sākunto, ātisāro.
[03] udumbarā asmiṃ padese santīti odumbaro. sāgarehi nibbatto sāgaro. sāgalamassa nivāso sāgalo. mathurā assa nivāso māthuro. mathurāya issaro māthuro. iccevamādayo yojetabbā.
[03] pacchā jāto pacchimo. evaṃ antimo, majjhimo, purimo, uparimo, heṭṭhimo, gopphimo. bodhisattajātiyā jāto bodhisattajātiyo, evaṃ ^a^M0.0192^ea^ assajātiyo, hatthijātiyo, manussajātiyo.
[03] ^b^ādiggahaṇena^eb^ niyuttatthāditopi tadassatthāditopi ^b^ima iya ika^eb^ iccete paccayā honti. anto niyutto antimo. evaṃ antiyo, antiko.
[03] putto assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti puttimo. evaṃ puttiyeva, puttiko, kappimo, kappiyo, kappiko.
[03] ^b^caggahaṇena kiya^eb^paccayo hoti niyuttatthe. jātiyaṃ niyutto jātikiyo, andhe niyutto andhakiyo, jātiyā andho jaccandho, jaccandhe niyutto jaccandhakiyo.
[03] rājaputtānaṃ samūho rājaputtako. evaṃ rājaputto, mānussako, mānusso, māyūrako, māyūro, māhiṃsako, māhiṃso.
[03] gāmānaṃ ^a^M0.0193^ea^ samūho gāmatā. evaṃ janatā, bandhutā, sahāyatā, nagaratā.
[03] madanassa ṭhānaṃ madaniyaṃ, bandhanassa ṭhānaṃ bandhaniyaṃ, mucchanassa ṭhānaṃ mucchaniyaṃ, evaṃ rajaniyaṃ, kamaniyaṃ, gamaniyaṃ, dussaniyaṃ, dassaniyaṃ.
[03] dhūmo viya dissati aduṃ vanaṃ tadidaṃ dhūmāyitattaṃ, timiraṃ viya dissati aduṃ vanaṃ tadidaṃ timirāyitattaṃ.
[03] duṭṭhu ^a^M0.0194^ea^ nissitaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ, vedaṃ nissitaṃ vedallaṃ, duṭṭhu ṭhānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ, vedassa ṭhānaṃ vedallaṃ.
[03] abhijjhā assa pakati abhijjhālu, abhijjhā assa bahulā vā abhijjhālu. evaṃ sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu.
[03] alasassa bhāvo ālasyaṃ, arogassa bhāvo ārogyaṃ. paṃsukūlikassa bhāvo paṃsukūlikattaṃ, anodarikassa bhāvo anodarikattaṃ. saṅgaṇikārāmassa bhāvo saṅgaṇikārāmatā, niddārāmassa bhāvo niddārāmatā.
[03] visamassa bhāvo vesamaṃ, sucissa bhāvo socaṃ.
[03] ramaṇīyassa bhāvo rāmaṇīyakaṃ, manuññassa bhāvo mānuññakaṃ.
[03] visesatthe ^b^tara tama isika iya iṭṭha^eb^iccete paccayā honti.
[03] sabbe ime pāpā, ayamimesaṃ visesena pāpoti pāpataro. evaṃ pāpatamo, pāpisiko, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho.
[03] medhā ^a^M0.0196^ea^ yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatītimedhāvī. evaṃ māyāvī.
[03] ^b^caggahaṇena so^eb^paccayo hoti. sumedhā yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti sumedhaso.
[03] tapo yassa atthi tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti tapassī. evaṃ yasassī, tejassī.
[03] daṇḍo yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti daṇḍiko, daṇḍī. evaṃ māliko, mālī.
[03] madhu ^a^M0.0197^ea^ yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti madhuro. evaṃ kuñjaro, muggaro, mukharo, susiro, (sīsaro, sukaro, suṅkaro), subharo, suciro, ruciro.
[03] guṇo yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti guṇavā. evaṃ yasavā, dhanavā, paññavā, balavā, bhagavā.
[03] sati yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti satimā, evaṃ jutimā, rucimā, thutimā, dhitimā, matimā, bhāṇumā.
[03] saddhā ^a^M0.0198^ea^ yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatībhi saddho, evaṃ pañño, amaccharo.
[03] āyu assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti āyasmā.
[03] suvaṇṇena pakataṃ kammaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ. evaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ jatumayaṃ, rajatamayaṃ, iṭṭhakamayaṃ, ayomayaṃ, mattikā mayaṃ, dārumayaṃ, gomayaṃ.
[03] pañcannaṃ pūraṇo pañcamo, evaṃ sattamo, aṭṭhamo, navamo, dasamo.
[03] eko ca dasa ca ekādasa, ekādasannaṃ pūraṇī ekādasī. pañcaca dasa ca pañcadasa, pañcadasannaṃ pūraṇī pañcadasī. cattāro ca dasa ca catuddasa, catuddasannaṃ pūraṇī cātuddasī.
[03] tāsaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ ante ^b^ti^eb^kārāgamo hoti. vīsati, tiṃsati.
[03] ^b^tuggahaṇena dvissa du di do^eb^ ādesā ca honti. durattaṃ, dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ, dohaḷinī.
[03] ^b^caggahaṇena dvi^eb^iccetassa ^b^di^eb^kāro hoti. dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ pārupetvā.
[03] tesaṃ ^a^M0.0203^ea^ ^b^catuttha dutiya tatiyānaṃ^eb^ aḍḍhūpapadānaṃ ^b^aḍḍhaḍḍhudivaḍḍha diyaḍḍha aḍḍhatiyā^eb^desā honti, ^b^aḍḍhū^eb^papadena sahanippajjante.
[03] aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo diyaḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
[03] sarūpānaṃ padabyañjanānaṃ ekaseso hoti asakiṃ. puriso ca puriso ca purisā.
[03] ^b^sarūpāna^eb^miti kimatthaṃ? hatthī ca asso ca ratho ca pattiko ca hatthiassarathapattikā,
[03] 389, 413^b^.^eb^ ^b^gaṇane dasassa dviticatupañcachasattāṭṭhanavakānaṃ vī ti cattāra paññā cha sattāsanavā yosu, yonañcīsamāsaṃ ṭhi ri tī tuti^eb^.

[03] gaṇane ^b^dasa^eb^ssa dvika tika catukka pañcaka chakka sattakāṭṭhaka navakānaṃ sarūpānaṃ katekasesānaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ^b^vī ti cattāra paññā cha satta asa nava^eb^iccādesā honti asakiṃ ^b^yo^eb^su, ^b^yo^eb^nañca ^b^īsaṃ āsaṃ ṭhi ri ti īti uti^eb^iccādesā honti. pacchā puna nippajjante.
[03] vīsaṃ ^a^M0.0204^ea^, tiṃsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ, paññāsaṃ, saṭṭhi, sattari, sattati, asīti, navuti.
[03] ^b^catū^eb^papadassa gaṇane pariyāpannassa ^b^tu^eb^kārassa lopo hoti, uttarapadādi^b^ca^eb^kārassa ^b^cuco^eb^pi ādesā honti navā.
[03] ^b^apiggahaṇena^eb^ anupapadassāpi padādi^b^ca^eb^kārassa. lopohoti navā, ^b^ca^eb^ssa ^b^cuco^eb^pi honti. tālīsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ, cuttālīsaṃ, cottālīsaṃ.

[03] ye saddā aniddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā, akkharapadabyañjanato, itthipumanapuṃsakaliṅgato ^a^M0.0205^ea^, nāmupasagganipātato, abyayībhāvasamāsataddhitākhyātato, gaṇanasaṅkhyākālakārakappayogasaññāto, sandhipakativuddhilopāgamavikāraviparitato, vibhattivibhajanato ca, te nipātanā sijjhanti.
[03] dvīccevamādito ^b^ka^eb^paccayo hoti anekatthe ca, nipātanā sijjhanti.

[03] satassa dvikaṃ dvisataṃ, satassa tikaṃ tisataṃ, satassa catukkaṃ catusataṃ, satassa pañcakaṃ pañcasataṃ, satassa chakkaṃ chasataṃ, satassa sattakaṃ sattasataṃ, satassa aṭṭhakaṃ aṭṭhasataṃ, satassa navakaṃ navasataṃ, satassa dasakaṃ dasasataṃ, sahassaṃ hoti.

[03] dvikādīnaṃ taduttarapadānañca nippajjante yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. satassa dvikaṃ (tadidaṃ hoti) dvisataṃ, evaṃ tisataṃ, catusataṃ ^a^M0.0206^ea^, pañcasataṃ, chasataṃ, sattasataṃ, aṭṭhasataṃ, navasataṃ, dasasataṃ, sahassaṃ hoti.
[03] yāva tāsaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ uttari dasaguṇitañca kātabbaṃ.

[03] taṃ yathā? dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā sataṃ hoti, satassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā sahassaṃ hoti, sahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvā dasasahassaṃ hoti, dasasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvāsatasahassaṃ hoti, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ katvādasasatasahassaṃ hoti, dasasatasahassassadasaguṇitaṃ katvā koṭi hoti, koṭisatasahassassa sataguṇitaṃ katvā pakoṭi hoti. evaṃ sesāpi yojetabbā.
[03] yāsaṃ pana saṅkhyānaṃ aniddiṭṭhanāmadheyyānaṃ sakehi sakehi nāmehi nippajjante.

[03] satasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭi, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi, pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭipakoṭi ^a^M0.0207^ea^, koṭipakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ nahutaṃ, nahutasatasahassānaṃ sataṃ ninnahutaṃ, ninnahutasatasahassānaṃ sataṃ akkhobhiṇī. tathā bindu, abbudaṃ, nirabbudaṃ, ahahaṃ, ababaṃ, aṭaṭaṃ, sogandhikaṃ, uppalaṃ, kumudaṃ, padumaṃ, puṇḍarikaṃ, kathānaṃ, mahākathānaṃ, asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.
[03] gotamassa apaccaṃ gotamo. evaṃ vāsiṭṭho. venateyyo, ālasyaṃ, ārogyaṃ.
[03] ekena vibhāgena ekadhā. evaṃ dvidhā, tidhā, catudhā, pañcadhā, chadhā.
[03] so pakāro tathā, taṃ pakāraṃ tathā, tena pakārena tathā, tassa pakārassa tathā, tasmā pakārā tathā, tassa pakārassa tathā, tasmiṃ pakāre tathā. evaṃ yathā, sabbathā, aññathā, itarathā.
[03] ^b^tuggahaṇaṃ^eb^ kimatthaṃ? ^b^tatthā^eb^paccayo hoti. so pakāro tathatthā. evaṃ yathatthā. sabbathatthā, aññathatthā, itarathatthā.

[03] ko pakāro kathaṃ, kaṃ pakāraṃ kathaṃ, kena pakārena kathaṃ, kassa pakārassa kathaṃ, kasmā pakārā kathaṃ. kassa pakārassa kathaṃ, kasmiṃ pakāre kathaṃ, ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ, imaṃ pakāraṃ itthaṃ, iminā pakārena itthaṃ, imassa pakārassa itthaṃ, imasmā pakārā itthaṃ, imassa pakārassa itthaṃ, ^b^i^eb^masmiṃ pakāre itthaṃ.
[03] ādisarassa vā asaṃyogantassa ādibyañjanassa vā sarassa vuddhi hoti saṇakārake paccaye pare.
[03] ^b^iu^eb^iccetesaṃ ādibhūtānaṃ mā vuddhi hoti. tesu ca ^b^e o^eb^ vuddhāgamo hoti ṭhāne.
[03] byākaraṇamadhīte veyyākaraṇiko, nyāyamadhīte neyyāyiko, byāvacchassa apaccaṃ veyyāvaccho, dvāre niyutto dovāriko.
[03] isissa bhāvo ārisyaṃ, iṇassa bhāvo āṇyaṃ, usabhassa bhāvo āsabhaṃ, ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, iccevamādī yojetabbā.
[03] kvaci ādimajjhauttaraiccetesaṃ dīgharassā honti paccayesu ca apaccayesu ca.
[03] ^b^ādidīgho^eb^ tāva -- pākāro, nīvāro, pāsādo, pākaṭo, pātimokkho, pāṭikaṅkho iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^uttaradīgho^eb^ tāva -- khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā, añjanā giri, koṭarā vanaṃ, aṅgulī iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^uttararasso^eb^ tāva -- bhovādi nāma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so iccevamādi. aññepi yathājinavacanānuparodhena yojetabbā.
[03] tesu ādimajjhuttaresu yathājinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi hoti, kvaci lopo hoti, kvaci āgamo hoti, kvaci vikāro hoti, kvaci viparīto hoti, kvaci ādeso hoti.
[03] ^b^majjhevuddhi^eb^ ^a^M0.0212^ea^ tāva -- sukhaseyyaṃ, sukhakāri dānaṃ, sukhakāri sīlaṃ iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^ādivikāro^eb^ tāva -- ārisyaṃ, āṇyaṃ, āsabhaṃ, ajjavaṃ iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^uttarāadeso^eb^ tāva -- sabbaseyyo, sabbaseṭṭho, cittaṃ iccevamādi. evaṃ yathājinavacanānuparodhena sabbattha yojetabbā.
[03] ^b^a i^eb^ti akāro, ^b^i ī^eb^iti ivaṇṇo, ^b^u ū^eb^iti uvaṇṇo, tesaṃ akāraivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ ^b^ā e o^eb^vuddhiyo honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ, ^b^ā ī ū^eb^vuddhi ca.

[03] puna ^b^vuddhi^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kimatthaṃ? uttarapadavuddhibhāvatthaṃ, aṅgamagadhehi āgatāti aṅgamāgadhikā. nigamajanapadesu jātāti ^a^M0.0214^ea^ negamajānapadā. purimajanapadesu jātāti porimajānapadā. sattāhe niyuttoti sattāhikā, catuvijje niyuttoti cātuvijjikā. iccevamādī yojetabbā.
[03] atha sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni ^b^cha^eb^ padāni, tāni tāni ^b^parassapada^eb^saññāni honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? ^b^ti anti, si tha, mi ma^eb^.
[03] sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni ^b^cha^eb^ padāni. tāni tāni ^b^attanopada^eb^saññāni honti.
[03] taṃ yathā? ^b^te ante, se vhe, e mhe^eb^.
[03] tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ parassapadānaṃ, attanopadānañca ^b^dve dve^eb^ padāni ^b^paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisa^eb^saññāni honti.

[03] taṃ yathā? ^b^ti anti^eb^ iti paṭhamapurisā, ^b^si tha^eb^ iti majjhimapurisā, ^b^mi ma^eb^ iti uttamapurisā. attanopadānampi ^b^te ante^eb^ iti paṭhamapurisā, ^b^se vhe^eb^ iti majjhimapurisā, ^b^e mhe^eb^ iti uttamapurisā. evaṃ sabbattha.
[03] ^b^paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisa^eb^miccanena kvattho? nāmamhi payujjamānepi tulyādhikaraṇe paṭhamo, tumhe majjhimo, amhe uttamo.

[03] yo koci karoti, taṃ añño ``karohi karohi'' iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā karontaṃ payojayati ^a^M0.0227^ea^ = kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārā payati. ye keci karonti, te aññe ``karotha karotha'' iccevaṃ bruvanti = kārenti, kārayanti, kārāpenti, kārāpayanti. yo koci pacati, taṃ añño ``pacāhi pacāhi''iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojayati = pāceti, pācayati, pācāpeti, pācāpayati. ye keci pacanti, te aññe ``pacatha pacatha'' iccevaṃ bruvanti = pācenti, pācayanti, pācāpenti. pācāpayanti. evaṃ bhaṇeti, bhaṇayati, bhaṇāpeti, bhaṇāpayati. bhaṇenti, bhaṇayanti, bhaṇāpenti, bhaṇāpayanti. tathariva aññepi yojetabbā.

[03] sametīti samatho, damatīti damatho, damanaṃ vā damatho, damitabboti vā damatho, daratīti daratho, jiṇṇabhāvaṃ rahissati gaṇhissatīti ratho, dabbasambhāre rahati gaṇhātīti vā ratho, davati gacchatīti dumo, davati vuddhi viruḷhi gacchati pavattatīti uddhaṃ vā dumo, pathavīpabbatādīsu gacchati patatīti himo, kammavācāya bandhati etthāti sīmā. bandhitabbāti vā sīmā. bhāyanti etasmāti bhīmo, satte avakhaṇḍenti nivārenti etenāti dāmo, mūsikādīhi khādīyati avakhaṇḍīyatīti vā dāmo, yāti gacchatīti yāmo, paresaṃ cittaṃ gaṇhituṃ samatthetīti sāmo, tiṭṭhanti etenāti thāmo, bhasati bhasmīkarīyatīti bhasmā.
[03] ^b^ā^eb^pubbassa ^b^cara^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^cchariyaccharaccherā^eb^ desā honti, ^b^ā^eb^pubbassa ca rasso hoti.

[03] kalitabbaṃ saṅkhyātabbanti kalyāṇaṃ, gaṇato paṭikkamitvā salanti etthāti paṭisalyāṇaṃ. evaṃ sallāṇo, paṭisallāṇo.

[03] paṭhamameva vajitabbāti pabbajjā, iñjanaṃ ejjā, samajjanaṃ samajjā, nisīdanaṃ nisajjā, vijānanaṃ vijjā visajjanaṃ visajjā, padanaṃ pajjā, hananaṃ vajjhā, esanaṃ icchā, atiesanaṃ aticchā, sadanaṃ sajjā, sayanti etthāti seyyā, sammā cittaṃ nidheti etāyāti saddhā, caritabbā cariyā, karaṇaṃ kiriyā, rujanaṃ rucchā, padanaṃ pacchā, riñcanaṃ ricchā, tikicchanaṃ titicchā, saṃkocanaṃ saṃkucchā, madanaṃ macchā, labhanaṃ lacchā, radihabbāti racchā, radanaṃ vilekhanaṃ vāracchā, adho bhāgena gacchatīti tiracchā, tiracchāno, ajanaṃ acchā, titikkhatīti titikkhā, saha āgamanaṃ sāgacchā, duṭṭhu bhakkhanaṃ dobhacchā, duṭṭhu rosanaṃ durucchā, pucchanaṃ pucchā, muhanaṃ mucchā, vasanaṃ vacchā, kacanaṃ kacchā, saha kathanaṃ sākacchā, tudanaṃ tucchā, visanaṃ vicchā, pisanaṃ picchillā, sukhadukkhaṃ mudati bhakkhatīti maccho ^a^M0.0295^ea^, sattānaṃ pāṇaṃ museti cajetīti maccu, satanaṃ saccaṃ, uddhaṃ dhunāti kampatīti uddhaccaṃ, naṭanaṃ naccaṃ, nitanaṃ niccaṃ, tathanaṃ tacchaṃ iccevamādi.

[03] vividhehi sīlādiguṇehi bhavatīti vibhū, visesena vā bhavatīti vibhū, sayaṃ attanā bhavatīti sayambhū, abhivitvā bhavatīti abhibhū, saṃ suṭṭhu dhunāti kampatīti sandhū, visesena bhāti dibbatīti vibhā, nissesena bhāti dibbatīti nibhā, pakārena bhāti dibbatīti pabhā, saha bhāsanti etthāti sabhā, ābhuso bhāti dibbatīti ābhā, bhujena kuṭilena gacchatīti bhujago, turitaturito gacchatīti turago, saṃ suṭṭhu pathaviṃ khanatīti saṅkho, visesena yamati uparamatīti viyo, suṭṭhu manati jānātīti sumo, pari samantato tanoti vitthāretīti parito iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^saca jā^eb^naṃ dhātūnamantānaṃ ^b^cajānaṃ kagā^eb^desā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ^b^ṇā^eb^nubandhe paccaye pare.
[03] oko ^a^M0.0296^ea^, pāko, seko, soko, viveko, cāgo, yogo, bhogo, rogo, rāgo, bhāgo, bhaṅgo, raṅgo, saṅgo.

[03] ^b^nuda sūda jana su lū hu pu bhū ñā a sa samu^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, ^b^phanda citi āṇa^eb^ iccevamādīhi sakāritehi ca ^b^yuṇvūnaṃ^eb^ paccayānaṃ ^b^ana ānana aka ānanakā^eb^desā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kattari, bhāvakaraṇesu ca.
[03] ^b^kattari^eb^ tāva -- panudatīti panūdano. evaṃ sūdano, janano, savaṇo, lavano, havano, pavano, bhavano, ñāṇo, asano, samaṇo.
[03] ^b^bhāve ca^eb^ -- panudate panūdanaṃ. evaṃ sūdanaṃ, jananaṃ, savaṇaṃ, lavanaṃ, havanaṃ, pavanaṃ, bhavanaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, asanaṃ, samaṇaṃ, sañjānanaṃ, kuyate kānanaṃ.
[03] ^b^kārite^eb^ ca -- phandāpīyate phandāpanaṃ, cetāpīyate cetāpanaṃ, āṇāpīyate āṇāpanaṃ.
[03] ^b^karaṇe^eb^ -- nudanti anenāti nūdanaṃ, evaṃ sūdanaṃ, jananaṃ, savaṇaṃ, lavaṇaṃ, havanaṃ, pavanaṃ, bhaganaṃ, ñāṇaṃ, asanaṃ, savaṇaṃ.

[03] puna ^a^M0.0297^ea^ ^b^kattari^eb^ -- nudatīti nūdako, sūdatīti sūdadhakā, janetīti janako, suṇotīti sāvako, lunātīti lāvako, juhotīti hāvako, punātīti pāvako, bhavatīti bhāvako, jānātīti jānako, asatīti asako, upāsatīti upāsako, sametīti samako.
[03] ^b^kārite^eb^ tu -- phandāpayatīti phandāpayako. evaṃ āṇāpayako, cetāpayako, sañjānanako.

[03] ^b^iya ta ma ki e sa^eb^iccetesaṃ sabbanāmānamanto saro dīghamāpajjate, kvaci ^b^dusa^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^u^eb^kāro guṇamāpajjate, ^b^da^eb^kāro ^b^ra^eb^kāramāpajjate, dhātvantassa ^b^sa^eb^ssa ca ^b^sa kkha ī^eb^iccete ādesā honti yathāsambhavaṃ. ete saddā sakena sakena nāmena yathānuparodhena buddhasāsane pacchā puna nippajjante.

[03] imamiva naṃ passatīti īdiso, yamiva naṃ passatīti yādiso, tamiva naṃ passatīti tādiso, mamiva naṃ passatīti mādiso, kimiva naṃ passatīti kīdiso, etamiva naṃ passatīti ediso, samānamiva naṃ passatīti sādiso ^a^M0.0298^ea^. imamiva naṃ passatīti īriso, yamiva naṃ passatīti yāriso, tamiva naṃ passatīti tāriso, mamiva naṃ passatīti māriso, kimiva naṃ passatīti kīriso, etamiva naṃ passatīti eriso, samānamiva naṃ passatīti sāriso. imamiva naṃ passatīti īdikkho, yamiva naṃ passatīti yādikkho, tamiva naṃ passatīti tādikkho, evaṃ mādikkho, kīdikkho, edikkho, sādikkho. īdī, yādī, tādī, mādī, kīdī, edī, sādī.

[03] ^b^bhī^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, ^b^mati. budhi pūjā^eb^dito ca ^b^tta^eb^ paccayo hoti.

[03] bhāyitabboti bhīto, supitabboti sutto, mijjitabbo sinehetabboti mitto, sammannitabboti sammato, saṃ suṭṭhu mānitabbo pūjetabboti sammato, sammānīyitthāti sammato, saṃkappīyateti saṅkappito ^a^M0.0299^ea^, saṃkappīyitthāti saṅkappito, sampādīyateti sampādito, sampādīyitthāti sampādito, avadhārīyateti avadhārito, avadhārīyitthāti avadhārito, bujjhitabbo ñātabboti buddho, ajjhayitabboti ito, etabbo gantabboti ito, viditabbo ñātabboti vidito, takkīyateti takkito, pūjīyateti pūjito, pūjīyitthāti pūjito, apacāyitabboti apacāyito, mānitabbo pūjetabboti mānito, apacīyateti apacito, vandīyateti vandito, vandīyitthāti vandito, sakkarīyateti sakkārito, sakkarīyitthāti sakkārito.

[03] ^b^vepu sī dava vamu ku dā bhū hui^eb^ccevamādīhi dhātūhi yathāsambhavaṃ ^b^thu ttima ṇima^eb^paccayā honti nibbattatthe.

[03] vepanaṃ vepo, tena nibbatto vepathu, sayanaṃ sayo, tena nibbatto sayathu, davanaṃ davo, tena nibbatto davathu. vamanaṃ vamo, tena nibbatto vamathu. kutti karaṇaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ kuttimaṃ. dāti dānaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ dattimaṃ. bhūti bhavanaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ bhottimaṃ. avahuti avahanaṃ, tena nibbattaṃ ohāvimaṃ.

[03] ^b^namhī^eb^ti kimatthaṃ? vipatti te jamma, vikati te jamma.

[03] ekassa padatthassa sakiṃ vāraṃ ekakkhattuṃ, dvinnaṃ padatthānaṃ sakiṃ vāraṃ dvikkhattuṃ, tiṇṇaṃ padatthānaṃ sakiṃ vāraṃ tikkhattuṃ, evaṃ catukkhattuṃ, pañcakkhattuṃ, chakkhattuṃ, sattakkhattuṃ, aṭṭhakkhattuṃ, navakkhattuṃ, dasakkhattuṃ. iccevamādayo saddā yojetabbā.

[03] āyatiṃ gamituṃ sīlaṃ yassa, so hotīti gāmī, āyatiṃ bhajituṃ sīlaṃ yassa, so hotīti bhājī, āyatiṃ passāpituṃ sīlaṃ yassa, so hotīti passāvi, āyatiṃ paṭṭhāyituṃ sīlaṃ yassa, so hotīti paṭṭhāyi.
[03] pacissate, pacanaṃ vā pāko, pākāya vajati. bhuñjissate, bhojanaṃ vā bhogo, bhogāya vajati. naccissate, naccanaṃ vā naccaṃ, naccāya vajati.
[03] nagaraṃ karissati nagarakāro vajati, sāliṃ lāvissati sālilāvo vajati, dhaññaṃ vapissati dhaññavāpo vajati, bhogaṃ dadissati bhogadāyo vajati, sindhuṃ pivissati sindhupāyo vajati.
[03] sesaiccetasmiṃ atthe ^b^ssaṃ ntu māna āna^eb^ iccete paccayā honti bhavissatikāle kammūpapade.

[03] kammaṃ karissati kammaṃ karissaṃ, evaṃ kammaṃ karonto, kammaṃ kurumāno, kammaṃ karāno vajati. bhojanaṃ bhuñjissati bhojanaṃ bhuñjissaṃ, evaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjanto, bhojanaṃ bhuñjamāno, bhojanaṃ bhuñjāno vajati. khādanaṃ khādissati khādanaṃ khādissaṃ, evaṃ khādanaṃ khādanto, khādanaṃ khādamāno, khādanaṃ khādāno vajati. maggaṃ carissati maggaṃ carissaṃ, evaṃ maggaṃ caranto, maggaṃ caramāno, maggaṃ carāno vajati. bhikkhaṃ bhikkhissati bhikkhaṃ bhikkhissaṃ, evaṃ bhikkhaṃ bhikkhanto, bhikkhaṃ bhikkhamāno, bhikkhaṃ bhikkhāno vajati.
[03] ^b^cha da ci ti su nī vi da pada tanu yata ada mada yuja vatumida mā pu ka la vara ve pu gupa dā^eb^ iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^tatraṇa^eb^ iccete paccayā honti yathāsambhavaṃ.

[03] ātapaṃ chādetīti chattaṃ, chatraṃ. ārammaṇaṃ cintetīti cittaṃ, citraṃ. cintenti sampayuttadhammā ethenāti vā cittaṃ, citraṃ. atthe abhissavetīti suttaṃ, sutraṃ. atthe sūcetīti vā suttaṃ, sutraṃ. satte netīti nettaṃ, netraṃ. satte icchitaṭṭhānaṃ nenti etenāti vā nettaṃ, netraṃ. pakārena vidatīti pavittaṃ, pavitraṃ. vividhena ākārena maṅga pāpaṃ punāti, sodhetīti pavittaṃ, pavitraṃ. sucibhāvaṃ vā pāpuṇātīti pavittaṃ, pavitraṃ. padati pāpuṇātīti patto, patro. āhārā patanti ettha bhājaneti pattaṃ, patraṃ. padati pavattatīti vā pattaṃ, patraṃ. tanoti vitthāretīti tantaṃ, tantraṃ, tanitabbaṃ vitthāretabbanti vā tantaṃ, tantra. yatatīti yattaṃ, yatraṃ. yatati vīriyaṃ karoti etenāti vā yattaṃ, yatraṃ. yatanaṃ vā yattaṃ, yatraṃ. sukhadukkhaṃ adati bhakkhatīti attā, atrā. madatīti mattaṃ, matraṃ. vatthuṃ yujjanti etenāti yottaṃ, yotraṃ. vattatīti vattaṃ, vatraṃ. midati ^a^M0.0305^ea^ sinehaṃ karotīti mittaṃ. mitraṃ. midati sinehati etāyāti mettā, metrā. pari samanta to sabbākārena minanti etāyāti mattā, matrā. mānanaṃ vā mattaṃ, matraṃ. attano kulaṃ punāti sodhetīti putto, putro. kalitabbaṃ saṅkhyātabbanti kalattaṃ, kalatraṃ. saṃsuṭṭhu vāreti etenāti varattaṃ, varatraṃ. vepati kampatīti vettaṃ, vetraṃ. gopitabbaṃ rakkhitabbanti guttaṃ. gutraṃ, gottaṃ, gotraṃ. dāti avakhaṇḍati etenāti dāttaṃ, dātraṃ iccevamādi.
[03] vāditānaṃ gaṇo vādittaṃ. evaṃ cārittaṃ, vārittaṃ, iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^mida pada ra^eb^nja ^b^tanu dhā^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^tti ti^eb^ iccete paccayā honti.

[03] midati sinehatīti metti, padati gacchatīti patti, ranjati etthāti ratti, tanoti vitthāretīti tanti, attano ^a^M0.0306^ea^ kulaṃ tanoti vitthāretīti vā tanti, paresaṃ itthīnaṃ puttaṃ dhāretīti dhāti, khīraṃ dhāretīti vā dhāti, attano sabhāvaṃ dhāretīti vā dhāti iccevamādi.
[03] 659, 669^b^.^eb^ ^b^usu ranja daṃsānaṃ daṃsassa daḍḍhoḍha ṭhā ca^eb^.
[03] ^b^usu ranja daṃsa^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ^b^daṃsa^eb^ssa ^b^daḍḍhā^eb^deso hoti, ^b^ḍha ṭha^eb^paccayā ca honti.
[03] usīyate uḍḍho, ranjanti etthāti raṭṭhaṃ, daṃsīyateti daḍḍho.
[03] savati hiṃsati etenāti satthaṃ, hirottappaṃ saṃvarati etenātivatthaṃ, saddānurūpaṃ asatibhavatīti attho,
[03] ^b^ranja uda idi cadi madi khuda chidi rudi dala susa suca vaca vaja^eb^ iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^dha da idda ka ira^eb^iccete paccayā honti, kvaci ^b^ja da^eb^ lopo ca, puna nippajjante.

[03] rañjitabbanti randhaṃ, ranjayitthāti vā randhaṃ, attani sannissitānaṃ macchamakarānaṃ pītisomanassaṃ undati pasavati janetīti samuddo, indati paramissariyaṃ karotīti indo, indattaṃ adhipatibhāvaṃ karotīti vā indo, canditabbo icchitabboti cando, mandati hāsetīti mando, maditabbo hāsetabboti vā mando, khudati pipāsetīti khuddo, chinditabboti chiddo, rudati hiṃsatīti ruddo, dalati duggatabhāvaṃ gacchatīti daliddo, sussatīti sukkaṃ, sucatītisoko, vacitabbanti vakkaṃ, appaṭihato hutvā vajati gacchatīti vajiraṃ iccevamādi.

[03] ^b^kaḍi ghaḍi vaḍi karaḍi maḍi saḍi kuṭhi bhaḍi paḍi daḍi raḍi taḍi isiḍi caḍi gaḍi aḍi laḍi meḍi eraḍi khaḍi^eb^ iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^ka^eb^paccayo hoti saha paccayena ca nippajjante yathāsambhavaṃ.

[03] kaṇḍitabbo chinditabboti kaṇḍo, ghaṇḍitabbo ghaṭetabboti ghaṇḍo, vaṇḍanti etthāti vaṇḍo, karaṇḍitabbo bhājetabboti karaṇḍo, maṇḍīyate vibhūsīyate etenāti maṇḍo, saṇḍanti gumbanti etthāti saṇḍo, aṅgamaṅgāni kuṇṭhati chindatīti kuṭṭhaṃ, bhaṇḍitabbanti bhaṇḍaṃ, paṇḍati liṅgavekallabhāvaṃ gacchatīti paṇḍako. daṇḍati āṇaṃ karoti etenāti daṇḍo, raṇḍati hiṃsatīti raṇḍo, visesena taṇḍati cāleti paresaṃ viññūnaṃ hadayaṃ kampetīti vitaṇḍo, isiṇḍati paresaṃ maddatīti isiṇḍo, caṇḍati caṇḍikkabhāvaṃ karotīti caṇḍo, gaṇḍati sannicayati samūhaṃ karoti etthāti gaṇḍo, aṇḍīyati nibbattīyatīti aṇḍo, laṇḍitabbo jigucchitabboti laṇḍo, meṇḍati ^a^M0.0309^ea^ kuṭilabhāvaṃ gacchatīti meṇḍo, eraṇḍati rogaṃ hiṃsatīti eraṇḍo, khaṇḍitabbo chinditabboti khaṇḍo iccevamādi.
[03] ^b^khāda ama gamu^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ^b^khandha andha gandhā^eb^desā honti, ^b^ka^eb^paccayo ca hoti.

[03] jātijarāmaraṇādīhi saṃsāradukkhehi khāditabboti khandho, amati aṅgamaṅgassa rujjanabhāvaṃ gacchatīti andho, cakkhunā amati rujjatīti vā andho, taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ vātena gacchatīti gandho. evaṃ khandhako, andhako, gandhako.

[03] ^b^paṭa kala kusa kada bhaganda mekha vakka takka palla sadda mūla bila vida caḍaṃ pañca vā vasa paci maca musa gotthu puthu bahu maṅga baha kamba samba agga^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi pāṭi padikehi ca uttarapadesu ^b^ala^eb^paccayo hoti, pacchā puna nippajjante.

[03] paṭe alanti paṭalaṃ, kale alanti kalalaṃ, pāpake akusale dhamme kusati chindatīti kusalaṃ, kusabhūte yathāsabhāvadhamme alanti vā kusalaṃ, kuse uddissa dāne alanti vā kusalaṃ, kuse sañcaye dhammasamudāye alanti ^a^M0.0310^ea^ vā kusalaṃ, kadde madde alanti kadalaṃ, bhagande secane alanti bhagandalaṃ, bhagande muttakarīsaharaṇe alanti vā bhagandalaṃ, mekhe kaṭivicitte alanti mekhalaṃ, vakke rukkhatace alanti vakkalaṃ, takke rukkhasilese alanti takkalaṃ, palle ninnaṭṭhāne alanti pallalaṃ, sadde harite alanti saddalaṃ, mūle patiṭṭhāne alanti mulālaṃ, biḷe nissaye alanti bilālaṃ, vide vijjamāne alanti vidalaṃ, caṇḍe alanti caṇḍālo, pañcannaṃ rājūnaṃ alanti pañcālo, vā gatigandhanesu alanti vālaṃ, vā padagamane alanti vā vāḷo, vase acchādane alanti vasalo, pace vitthāre alanti pacalo, mace corakamme alanti macalo, muse theyye, muse pāṇacāge vā alanti musalo, gotte vaṃse siṅgālajātiyaṃ alanti gotthulo, puthumhi vitthāre alanti puthulo, bahumhi saṅkhyāne alanti bahulo, bahumhi vuddhimhi alanti vā bahulo, maṅgamhi gamane alanti maṅgalaṃ, bahumhi vuddhimhi alanti bahalaṃ, kambamhi sañcalane alanti ^a^M0.0311^ea^ kambalaṃ. sambamhi maṇḍale alanti sambalaṃ, agge gatikoṭille alanti aggaḷaṃ. iccevamādayo aññepi saddā bhavanti.
[03] putha hutvā jātanti puthavī pathame jāto pathamo, pathavī, paṭhamo vā, puthu kilese janetīti puthujjano, puthu hutvā jātanti pathavī, pathavī vā.
[03] ^b^sasu dada ada mada^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^tu du^eb^iccete paccayā honti.

[03] aññe satte sasati hiṃsatīti sattu, dukkhaṃ dadātīti daddu, dukkhena adati bhakkhati etthāti addu, dukkhaṃ adati anubhavati jano etenāti vā addu, dukkhaṃ bhājanaṃ ^a^M0.0312^ea^ ādhāraṃ bhāvatīti vā addu, madati ummattaṃ karotīti maddu, madati maddabhāvaṃ karotīti vā maddu.
[03] cīyatīti cīvaraṃ, pivatīti pīvaro, pātabbaṃ rakkhitabbanti vā pīvaraṃ. dhāreti dhāretvā jīvitaṃ kappetīti dhīvaro, dhīvaraṃ.
[03] ^b^muna yata agga pata kava suca ruca mahāla bhaddāla manai^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ipaccayo hoti.

[03] atthānatthaṃ munāti, ñeyyadhammaṃ lakkhaṇādivasena vā jānātīti muni, yatati vīriyaṃ karotīti yati, aggati kuṭilabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aggi, patati seṭṭho hutvā purato gacchatīti pati, kabyaṃ bandhatīti kavi, kantaṃ manāpavacanaṃ vadatīti vā kavi. sucati parisuddhaṃ bhavatīti suci, rucati dibbatīti ruci, mahantaṃ vibhāvaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ lātīti mahāli, bhaddaṃ yasaṃ lātīti bhaddāli, manaṃ tattha ratane nayatīti maṇi.
[03] ^b^vida valla masa sida dukukapu maya udi khajja kura^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ^b^ūra^eb^paccayohoti.

[03] vidituṃ alanti vidūro, vidūraṭṭhāne jāto vedūro, vallati vallabhāvena bhavatīti vallūro, vallati aññamaññaṃ bandhatīti vā vallūro, āmasitabboti masūro, sindati siṅgārabhāvaṃ gacchatīti sindūro, sindati virocatīti vā sindūro, gamituṃ alaṃ anāsannattāti dūro, kuti saddaṃ karotīti kūro, attano gandhena aññaṃ gandhaṃ kapati hanati hiṃsatīti kappūro, kappati rogāpanayane samatthetīti vā kappūro, mahiyaṃ ravatīti mayūro, mahiyaṃ yāti gacchatīti mayūro, paṃsuṃ undati pasavatīti undūro, khajjitabbo khāditabboti khajjūro, kurati akkosatīti kurūro.
[03] ^b^hana jana bhāri khanu ama ve vedhā siki hi^eb^ iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^ṇu nu ku^eb^iccete paccayā honti.

[03] bhojanaṃ ^a^M0.0314^ea^ hanati hiṃsati etenāti haṇu, hanu vā. gamanaṃ janetītī jāṇu, bhāṇu dibbatīti bhāṇu, nivāte riti gacchatītī reṇu, khaṇitabbo avadāritabboti khāṇu. aṅgamaṅgassa rujjanabhāvaṃ vijjhanabhāvaṃ amati gacchatīti aṇu, veṇu, veti tantasantāne bhavatītī veṇu, bahisārealantivāveṇu vacchaṃ, pāyetītī dhenu, atthaṃ dhāretītī dhātu, gamanapacanādikaṃ kriyaṃ dhāretītī vā dhātu, sīyatī bandhīyatītī setu, uddhaṃ gacchati pavattatītī ketu, attano phalaṃ hinoti pavattatītī hetu.
[03] ^b^kuṭa kusa kaṭai^eb^ccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ^b^ṭha^eb^paccayo hotī.
[03] aṅgamaṅgaṃ kuṭati chindatītī kuṭṭhaṃ, dhaññena chādetabbo pūretabbotī koṭṭho, kaṭitabbaṃ madditabbanti, kaṭṭhaṃ.
[03] ^b^manu pūra suṇa kusu ila ala maha si ki^eb^ iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ^b^usa nusa isa^eb^iccete paccayā honti, puna nippajjante.

[03] kusalākusale ^a^M0.0315^ea^ dhamme manati jānātīti manusso, mānuso. kāraṇā kāraṇaṃ manati jānātīti vā manusso, mānusso. atthānatthaṃ manati jānātīti vā manusso, mānusso. mātāpitūnaṃ hadayaṃ pūretīti puriso, attano manorathaṃ pūretīti vā puriso, pūretīti vā poso, sasurehi suṇitabbā hiṃsitabbāti suṇisā, dvinnaṃ jānānaṃ kulasantānaṃ karotīti vā suṇisā, kucchitabbanti karīsaṃ, gabbhaṃ vimocetīti suriso, tamandhakāravidhamanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ surati hiṃsatīti sūriyo, rogaṃ hiṃsatīti sirīso, ilati kampatīti ^b^i^eb^lliso, taṇhāya dubbalo hutvā ilati kampatīti vā illigho, pāpakaraṇe alati samatthetīti alaso, mahitabbo pūjetabboti mahiso, sīyati bandhīyatīti sīsaṃ, kitabbaṃ hiṃsitabbanti kisaṃ, iccevamādi.
